## Installation

You can install the development version of lbl from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cole-brokamp/lbl")
```

## Overview

A labeled vector (`lbl_vec`) is an atomic vector (e.g., logical, integer, double, character)

```{r}
library(lbl)
## basic example code
```
